name: MyTwoCentsToday
0:
”Alexa, launch My Two Cents Today”
”Alexa, open My Two Cents Today”
”Alexa, start my Two Cents Today”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my two cents today
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You want to hear what people are thinking about and what's on their mind? Then this skill is for you! Just launch it and listen to what people have to say.

And if you would like to pitch in with your very own two cents, just download the Castlingo App (available on the Appstore and Google Play), record an audio, and then post your audio onto the "My Two Cents Today" channel.

This skill was created using Buildlingo, a Witlingo product. For more, go to: www.witlingo.com/buildlingo
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
